findings.title: DoS with block gas limit
findings.description: The contract may be vulnerable to Denial of Service (DoS) attacks due to the block gas limit.

findings.title: Owner can change the tax and liquidity fee
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the tax and liquidity fee.

findings.title: Owner can change dev fee
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the development fee.

findings.title: Owner can change the maximum transaction amount
findings.description: The owner has privileges to modify the maximum transaction amount without restrictions.

findings.title: Owner can change dev wallet
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the developer's wallet address.

findings.title: Owner can change uniswap router and pair
findings.description: The owner has privileges to modify Uniswap router and pair settings.

findings.title: Owner can exclude from and include to autoliquidity
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to exclude from and include to autoliquidity, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can exclude from the fee
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to exclude addresses from the fee.

findings.title: Owner can disable and enable swap and liquify
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to disable and enable swap and liquidity functionality.

findings.title: Owner can lock and unlock
findings.description: The owner has privileges to lock and unlock, allowing them to retake privileges even after ownership was renounced.

findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The functions includeInReward() and _getCurrentSupply() use loops that can cause an OUT_OF_GAS exception if the excluded addresses list is too long.
